title: @RIOT Please help D:
body: I still cant load the PROJECT page, http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/skins-project/ the little loading icon gets to halfway and then stops and wont move further, some background music starts playing but thats it, I've left it for 40 minutes and it still wont move, i really want to explore the page but i just cant, it wont work on my laptop either, and its not my internet either because i tried it at a friends house and it worked on his computer but not mine, (this happened before the skins were announced) but i really want to look at the project stuff, I've updated flash player and everything, i have a fast computer, i don't know why i cant see it. its advertised all over the home page of LoL i should be able to take part in it :(

replies.body:
Hey man, I'm by no means a tech expert but have you looked at updating your browser? It seems to me like a compatibility issue and out of date software is normally the culprit.

I'd also recommend using Chrome if you're not already: https://www.google.com/chrome/browser/desktop/

I'm also assuming you're using a desktop but there are links for the mac version there as well.

Hope you can join in the PROJECT: AWESOME with us soon!
